description: Get all the ingredients together to prepare the tea.
name: Gather Ingredients
pseudocode:
1. Identify the ingredients needed for the tea.
2. Locate all the ingredients.
3. Place all the ingredients in one place for easy access.

description: Get all the tools together to prepare the tea.
name: Gather Tools
pseudocode:
1. Identify the tools needed for tea preparation.
2. Locate each tool.
3. Place all tools in one place for easy access.
